ProjectCount.description: Count of project, which user included.

ProjectStatusType.description:
Project status.
May be empty, default value: 'Active'.
,Enum numbers description
* 0 - Active,
* 1 - Failed,
* 2 - Abandoned,
* 3 - Rejected,
* 4 - Closed,
* 5 - Suspend

PropertyType.description:
Project status.
May be empty, default value: 'Type'.

,Enum numbers description
* 0 - Type,
* 1 - Status,
* 2 - Priority
